parameters.query:
SELECT 
  sa.name,
  sa.start_date_local,
  sa.distance,
  sa.moving_time,
  sa.elapsed_time,
  sa.total_elevation_gain,
  sa.average_speed,
  sa.average_watts,
  sa.max_watts,
  sa.weighted_average_watts,
  sa.kilojoules,
  sa.average_heartrate,
  sa.max_heartrate,
  sa.type
FROM strava_activities sa
WHERE sa.athlete_id = {{ $json.body.athlete_id }}::bigint
ORDER BY sa.start_date_local DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT id, brand_name, product_name, product_url, description, placement_text
FROM ad_placements
WHERE is_active = true
  AND (start_date IS NULL OR start_date <= CURRENT_DATE)
  AND (end_date IS NULL OR end_date >= CURRENT_DATE)
  AND (max_impressions IS NULL OR current_impressions < max_impressions)
ORDER BY priority ASC
LIMIT 3;
